tool_description: Documents the physical condition of objects, identifies conservation needs, and provides handling recommendations for safe digitization.

accession_number.description: Unique identifier of the object being assessed

overall_condition.description: General condition: excellent, good, fair, poor, critical

surface_condition.description: Surface state: pristine, minor_wear, moderate_damage, severe_damage

light_sensitivity.description: Light sensitivity level: none, low, moderate, high, extreme

conservation_priority.description: Urgency of conservation needs: none, low, medium, high, urgent

assessor_name.description: Name of the conservator or curator conducting assessment

error_messages: Object not found: Accession number does not exist in collection database
Invalid condition value: overall_condition must be one of [excellent, good, fair, poor, critical]
Invalid surface condition: Must be one of [pristine, minor_wear, moderate_damage, severe_damage]
Invalid light sensitivity: Must be one of [none, low, moderate, high, extreme]
Invalid conservation priority: Must be one of [none, low, medium, high, urgent]
Invalid assessment date: Must be valid ISO 8601 date-time format
Empty assessor name: Assessor name cannot be empty
usage: Conduct thorough condition assessment before any handling or digitization activities. Use standardized terminology and document all observations carefully.

digitization_clearance.description: Whether object is cleared for photography and handling

recommended_protocols.description: Specific handling and photography protocols to follow
